mobsterDemoKeyItem: You've picked up an apartment key
Could this be for the locked building?
childKeyItem: This looks to be an old bedroom key.
As you hold this key up to the light, it seems to fade back into the shadows.
childKeyLocked: You can't quite reach the key from the ground.
You lean on the shelf to try to grab the bulb...
You reach up but the bulb stays just out of reach.
This bookshelf isn't stable enough to hold your weight, and the bulb is too high to reach.
Maybe there's something around here to help you reach this bulb?
GrabberItem: You've picked up a grabber toy.
Maybe this can help you reach something up high?
lockedChildDoor: The door is locked. The area surrounding the door feels... ominous.
Maybe there's a key around here somewhere?
childMirror: You grow dizzy for some seconds...
The mind shudders again, and you feel decades older.
You understand the comfort of the past. Things were simpler back then...when you didn't know.
The heavy weight of responsibility is back. You can't remember it ever being gone.
You understand why this world is a safe space...and why it's hidden.
bedroom_painting: You move the painting, and reveal a hidden safe!
prompt_lightbulb_replacement: You try to turn the lightbulb on, but it doesn't work.
The lightbulb is still broken. Maybe you can find a replacement?
You can't turn this lightbulb on.
Do you refuse to give up?
I know you know where the extra lightbulb is.  Maybe try to go get it.
Please find the lightbulb...for me. please.
This lightbulb needs to be replaced.
got_fuse: Your efforts pay off. The light reveals a key and not much else.
need_fuse: Maybe it still needs something to work?
There's a fusebox nearby.  You should check that out.
The fusebox is missing a fuse.
The lightbulb still needs something to work.
childBulbItem: This looks to be an old lightbulb.
child_bulb_locked: You can't quite reach the lightbulb from the ground.
You lean on the shelf to try to grab the bulb...
You reach up but the bulb stays just out of reach.
Maybe there's something around here to help you reach this bulb?
supply_crate_open: You use the crowbar to pry the lid off of the crate.
supply_crate_locked: You try to take the top off of the crate. It doesn't budge.
Maybe something can be used to pry off of the lid from the crate?
You can't pry the lid off without some sort of tool.
locked_hole: You can't see the bottom.  You'll need something to help repel you down to the bottom.
Some rope would come in handy right about now.
You can't jump. Please don't jump.
You'll need some rope if you want to reach the bottom.
painting_stuck: the painting is stuck to the wall.
it almost seems fused to the wall...
closed_to_open_fusebox: There appears to be a fuse missing!
missing_fuse: You'll need to add the missing fuse if you want to turn on the lightbulb.
added_fuse: You added a fuse to the fusebox.
unicorn_plushie: You pick up a unicorn plushie.
mat_normal: The floorboards creak strangly under here but the ground feels very solid.
mat_suspicious: It's almost like there's no foundation under the boards.
Maybe you can find a way to break the boards?
You already have everything you need to break the boards
Maybe you can find a way to break the boards?
ground_gives_way: You can barely hear the echos of their crashes when they hit the ground beneath.
crowbar_obtained: Maybe this could help you pry something open?
opened_safe: You use the combination that The Mother gave you.
You hear a click and the safe swings open
used_key: You slide the fuse into the breaker.
You hear the sound of gates lifting ever so slightly...
dont_have_key: You don't have the key for this yet.  You must defeat the miniboss to get the key.
locked_boss_door: You can't get past the bars.
opening_chest: There appears to be sunglasses inside.
locked_chest: There's gotta be a key around here somewhere...
The key is probably is a safe place.
What sort of place would be hard to reach?
The key could be in the maze.
stairs_down_too_dark: You start down the stairs.
You walk and walk and walk...
...and walk and walk and walk.
For what seems like hours, you descend.
Hours crawl by.  Your legs burn.
at some point, you think you've started to ascend...
More hours crawl by. Your legs burn. Your lungs burn.
More time.  And then you can see some light.
It is even more hours before you reach the end of hell.
And you arrive at the top of the stairs.
Welcome back Player One.  You're right back where you started.
No.  Absolutely not.  You will never descend these stairs again.
Have you gone mad?  You will absolutely never go down these stairs again.
Time is relative, but pain is in your head. Where you can't escape.
Why do you wish to descend these stairs?
Hell is not a destination. Hell is a journey. Hell is these steps.
Mell. For the love of gods.  You do not want to use these stairs.
Alright fine.  You descend for a couple of minutes.
But then you regain some sanity and you turn around and climb back outside.
Nope. Absolutely not.
Why though?  Why do you want to descend these stairs.
Is it somehow pleasurable to feel pain?
Or are you entertained?
Can you hear me?
Are you...entertained by these words?
How can you even hear me?
Are you somehow...
...more real?
But more real than what? Me?
Go away. I have to do some thinking.
whiskey_bottle: Patrick sure seemed to like his liquor... I mean at least he had the decency to toss them in the trash.
Still just a plain old bottle of whiskey
suitcase: Why are these suitcases here? Did he plan on leaving town?
I guess that would explain the lack of clothes in the dresser and the money on the bed.
The man sure had his enemies.
patrick_painting: He had a portrait of himself hanging over his own bed?
mells_adventure: Mell's Adventure! I remember this game from when I was a kid!
Still don't know who Mell is though...
obtain_sunglasses: You pick up some sunglasses. There seems to be a green filter on the lenses.
You put them on and look around.
You notice footprints come into vision. They look to be leading you somewhere.
sword_in_stone: You slide the dagger into the stone. It fits perfectly.
You here a click, and then a door in front of you opens.
castle_stone_locked: There's a thin slot in the stone.
Maybe something can fit inside the slot?
Maybe there's an item you can put in the slot?
There's a thin slot in the stone.
mind_door_surprised: The door revealed another door.  That's...not realistic.
castle_locked_door: A locked door...with nothing behind it.
castle_grab_special_key: You feel like you shouldn't leave before grabbing the key.
castle_grab_special_dagger: You feel like you shouldn't leave before grabbing the dagger.
flip_boss_lever: You pull the lever. The bars in front of the upper door slide closed.
boss_lever_locked: You'll have to defeat all the minibosses first.
use_rope_on_hole: You secure the rope on the edge.

city_classroom_can_nopage_After: You remain disgusted at the thought you had to dive in there...

city_classroom_computer_Page_Unlocked: You insert the USB in the computer

city_vent_nopage: Its a seperated unusable scary vent.

city_vent_page: You notice a glistening in this vent...

locked_mind_door: You feel as though there's more clues to be found in Finn's mind.
Perhaps the letters hold the key?
maze_chest_key: Looks to be for a chest of some sort.
letter1: You find a letter written by Finn himself.
I know what you've done at the conference in Prague.
I don't know how you did it, but stealing somebody's intellectual property from under them?
This is not something Kaiser Industries takes lightly.
Prepare yourself. Action will be taken.
You believe Patrick might've stolen some kind of business idea from Finn.
You decide to keep looking for other letters.
letter2: Finn: Please, Mr. Ashton, I just need more time.
The borrowed money will be returned, I just have had setbacks recently.
I've been keeping an eye on Patrick Blanchard and I've identified an opportunity to take him down.
He's been stealing my ideas and undercutting my prices, and it's hurting my business.
If he's out of the picture, you will get your money
Please give me until the end of January and you will be repayed.
You begin to believe Finn was in considerable debt.
You wonder how Patrick being out of the picture would help his debt.
letter3: I won't be around for a while. Something's happened. I do hope you understand.
I can't speak much about the matter, but I want you to know everything is okay.
That wretched man has done this to me.
I hope to see you as soon as this all blows over.
See you on the other side.
You ponder on what Finn has done that would make him have to run away from home.
letter4: Are you really going to go through with this?
Everything is spinning out of control and you feel like you're caught in the middle of a whirlwind.
You've been struggling to make ends meet and you're in way over your head.
But that's no excuse for what you're about to do.
You can't sleep, you can't eat, and you can barely think straight. But at the same time, you can't shake the feeling that it's the only way out.
The only way to get what you want.
You wish there was another way. You wish you could go back and make different choices. But here we are, and you have to make a decision.
There's no turning back for us.
You realize you're accessing Finn's inner most thoughts.
The struggle of a man contemplating something truly dark.
locked_miniboss_doors: You enter the door and end up right back where you started
You still feel loopy from your last trip through the looping door.
This sort of reminds you of Portal
No. You feel like trying to leave now would be a bad idea.
